chapters.title: Chapter 4: Advantages to a Bond
chapters.info: High Lord Weiramon Saniago, p. 136—A High Lord of Tear. Rand placed him in charge of his campaigns in Cairhien at first. He also controlled part of the massive army Rand sent against Illian. His sign is a silver Crescent-and-stars. Rand kept him close to ensure he committed as few blunders as possible; he can blunder with the worst of them. He is only brave because he is too stupid to be afraid. He arranges his hair as if to emphasize just how much he is balding. He has an oiled, pointed beard. He is tall. According to Moridin, he was quite shaken by what Rand did to him.
